tutorial.roles.popup.healthui1: Open the Doctor's health interface with [InputType.Health]
tutorial.roles.popup.engineer_wiring3: Attach the wire to the POWER connection.
tutorial.roles.popup.engineer_wiring5: Attach the wire to the POWER connection.
tutorial.roles.engineer.objective.rewire: Wire the Junction Box's POWER output
Connect the wire to the lamp's POWER input
tutorial.roles.medicalinstructor.healthu: “Okay, bring it here. Just highlight me with your mouse and press [InputType.Health] to enter my Health interface.”
tutorial.roles.medicalinstructor.medfabr: “Now be a good assistant and use the Naloxone on me. Remember, [InputType.Health] to enter my Health interface.”
tutorial.roles.medicalinstructor.patient: “There are several patients here, each with a different affliction. Inspect each of them ([InputType.Health] to enter Health interface!) to learn about what ails them.”
entitydescription.magnesium: Used in the manufacture of explosives and medical compounds.
entitydescription.lithium: Most commonly used in the manufacture of batteries and antipsychotic drugs. Reacts violently when in contact with water.
